attributes.action: Make destroying or vandalising the Union Flag a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details: We want the Government to make destroying or vandalising the British flag a criminal offence.
attributes.background: We feel that our flag and its colours represents us as a nation and is what our ancestors fought two World Wars and died for.
